channel.title: Bot question
channel.description:
Should i keep my bot minimized or open on the desktop?
Or is there really any difference in like how much ram it uses or how hot it can make my cpu?

item.title: Bot question
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“kingman002, post:26, topic:396719”][quote author=Saphire` link=topic=493888.msg3610942#msg3610942 date=1306586571]

Botters, are pussy motherfuckerz, i hope all botters get caught and a perm BAN.

play legit, be legit. then get lvl 138 GF

Why are you against bots? This is a rs2 hacking forum…
[/quote]
Lol?

facepalm[/quote]
we seem to be getting lots of facepalms today

Read full topic

item.title: Bot question

item.description:

103 or 104 combat atm I forget, and have a zerker in the 80s… Maybe 10% botted I wanna say… never botted combat much. Lots of my time spent in the game was spent messing around, house parties, stuffz like that.

item.title: Bot question
item.dc:creator: @_SITTION |SITTION|
item.description:
@_SITTION wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:13, topic:396719”][quote author=mihalich link=topic=493888.msg3610973#msg3610973 date=1306589144]

Botters, are pussy motherfuckerz, i hope all botters get caught and a perm BAN.

play legit, be legit. then get lvl 138 GF

Well those of us over the age of twelve cough have things called lifes and jobs were we can’t play on the computer for 5 hours a day.

That excuse is really old and not accurate at all. I have a so called “life” involving jobs/friends and still get around to enjoy RS.
[/quote]

Are you lvl 138? Am i? no. his point is valid.[/quote]

I didnt sad to be level 138, i mean that if you bot, and Reached a skill 99 or level 138 you did not train that account

in otherwords: if your level 138 ( botted ) and then u get a ban or maded some money, and get angry because you get banned

Thats just sad.

Read full topic

item.title: Bot question
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

Alright thanks for the answer haha, but like Andrew said. I got shit to do and rs is fun to play when i have the time so i bot my acc up so when i have my free time i can do fun stuff on rs not train.

Read full topic

item.title: Bot question
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

Andrew Ferguson:

I wouldn’t even bot anymore, that bot hunting thing Jagex posted was a diversion. They have new, very powerful ways of catching bots now that can’t be avoided.

I just finished getting 3 99’s and nothing happened My adventure log is F’d up though LOL
